member.name: T:BinokelDeluxe.GameLogic.Test.FourPlayerStateTest
member.summary: Defines tests for the SingleGameStateBridge for four players. See https://github.com/Timmeey86/binokel-deluxe/wiki/Glossary for the difference between player positions and numbers.

member.name: M:BinokelDeluxe.GameLogic.Test.FourPlayerStateTest.GetPlayerPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the position on the table of the player with the given number, where the dealerPosition represents number zero.
member.param: The number of the player, where 0 = dealer, 1 = right-hand player of dealer, etc.
The position on the table where 0 = human player (single game) or host (multiplayer).
member.returns: The position for the given number in the current game.
